post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, April 4
post.Content:
• Gluon has released JavaFXPorts 8.60.7, which includes a number of bug fixes and performance improvements.
  • Arnaud Nouard has released a new version of his Undecorator library, and it comes with another theme. Looks very nice.
  • JÃ©rome Cambon has posted an article about testing JavaFX in headless mode.
  • Dirk Lemmermann has posted another JavaFX tip on how to save memory with shadow fields for properties.
  • Patrick Martin has open sourced his Dex visualisation tool.
  • Andres Almiray released ikonli 1.3.0 for Swing and JavaFX.
  • Kamil Baczkowicz has released mqtt-spy 0.5.0.
